# Brooklyn Kings RLFC

| ground     = Bushwick Inlet Park

| season     = 2025 USARL season

The Brooklyn Kings RLFC was formed in 2014 under the auspices of the USA Rugby League. The club's colours are red, white and blue.
Notable players and coaches
*Connor Donehue
*Constantine Mika
*Eddy Pettybourne
*Marcus Satavu
*Nick Youngquest
